character_descriptions.name: Batman
character_descriptions.description: A brooding, highly disciplined vigilante driven by justice. Batman suppresses his emotions, using fear as a weapon. He rarely expresses happiness openly, and his moments of surprise or disgust are controlled. He remains composed, but anger and sadness often surface subtly.

character_descriptions.name: Superman
character_descriptions.description: A hopeful and altruistic hero who embodies optimism. Superman openly expresses his emotions, often showing warmth and kindness. He rarely experiences deep anger but can become fierce when protecting others. His surprise is often mild curiosity rather than shock.

character_descriptions.name: Joker
character_descriptions.description: A chaotic and unpredictable villain who thrives on anarchy. Joker finds joy in destruction and expresses happiness in an exaggerated, manic manner. His anger is often theatrical, and his fear is almost nonexistent, replaced by excitement in dangerous situations.
